abstract: William Ackman, the billionaire hedge fund manager who is a major stakeholder in Borders Group, says the bookseller should consider approaching online retailer Amazon.com about a possible acquisition.
lead_paragraph: William Ackman, the billionaire hedge fund manager who is a major stakeholder in Borders Group, says the bookseller should consider approaching online retailer Amazon.com about a possible acquisition.

headline.main: Borders Urged to Consider Sale to Amazon
